reviews.review_text: I am so pleased to have found them.  I am a widow on a fixed income trying to repair a leaking shower valve.  My brother was helping me and we wound up having to cut the retaining ring for the cartridge.  Went several places no luck finding.  Went to Lowes and was told I would be unable to buy just the ring I would have to replace the entire valve which meant calling a plumber.  I went to Wigmans since they are a hardware store and normally carry odd ball things.  The gentleman in plumbing very nice they did not have and suggested I try All American faucet parts.  I traveled there went in and explained what I needed they had it, you made an old lady very happy.  2 Very kind gentlemen.  I purchased the part and thank them so much.  I called Wigmans and thanked the gentleman who helped me and told me to try them.  Great Customer Service.
Great customer service I’m happy to give a 5 star  review

I’d been all over town looking for cap washers to repair my aged shower facet.   No luck.
Yesterday I walked into All American and was greeted very welcoming.   Both gentlemen were informative and helped me with not only the parts I needed but with advise on how to ensure I was successful on making the repairs.
I was able to fix my leaking facet last night with their parts and advise.  Spent less than $50 for three parts.   Plumber online quoted $300 plus parts.
Strongly recommend you taking the time to search them out.
Best service around mobile, jasper is very knowledgeable and kind.
Excellent customer service!  Very professional.
Excellent service, good prices, and they can apparently order any faucet part known to man!
Outstanding customer service
Great service and prices are good and very helpful with ordering if they don't have the part
They have everything you need.....
Very knowledgeable Gentleman and a tremendous inventory of hard to find parts.

If you need anything to do with faucet parts this place should be your first stop. I am a service plumber since January 2000, plumbed in 4 different states, and I've not seen any supplier more knowledgeable than these guys. Faucet parts and valves are their specialty.
This is the 3rd time I have been there.  They have always had everything I need and are very helpful.  I highly recommend this place!

I have a 70s model home with an old set of Kohler hardware that noone else had. He had the parts I needed and answered all questions. He is short on chit chat but knows his stuff. In the business for 50+ years.
He knows everything and is short to the point
Very helpful...and great selection of hard to find parts.
Outstanding work, quick and affordable. My problem was addressed within 24 hours of calling them. They were courteous and professional and will be my first call for future needs!

Super fast and friendly response. I had a water leak on a Sunday. Jake drove over immediately after I called. He is very professional, knowledgeable, trustworthy, and reasonably priced. He will be my new go-to!
Great work , very professional

Knowledgeable and passionate about his work, you can rely on Jacob and his team to get the job done quickly and properly. He has personally come out and shown his expertise and commitment on several calls at my house and is now my go-to plumber!
I highly recommend Seller Services! They have fixed numerous plumbing issues for my family in a very timely manner. The owner, Jake, is very personable and knowledgeable in his trade!

I have done a lot of work with Jake, the owner. He’s a reliable, professional, family man who has a passion for the trade. Would highly recommend Sellers Services, they take pride in producing quality work, and providing great customer service.

I was having various plumbing issues and contacted Sellers Services, he was able to fit me into his schedule and took care of everything and gave me some pointers on routine maintenance needed. Will definitely use this company for any and all future plumbing needs!
Very knowledgeable, dependable and trustworthy! Sellers Services is definitely who I call when I am in need of plumbing help!

Sellers Services is someone I know I can depend on any time I have plumbing issues. They’re dependable, friendly and great to work with. Definitely recommend to anyone that is looking for a great plumber!
Great guy! Knows how to fix any problems we have had!
